frontmatter.title: Meshery Provides the Service Mesh Management Plane and Kubernetes Evolves into an Enterprise Platform
frontmatter.author: Amalgam Insights
frontmatter.description: Meshery, an open-source project, delivers a service mesh management plane, simplifying network traffic management in Kubernetes clusters. Learn how Kubernetes evolves into an enterprise platform with Meshery's contribution. Read more in Amalgam Insights' research.
